logicalTable.name: F0 Sales Base Measures
logicalTable.description:
This logical table contains metrics like Revenue, Billed Qty, Booked Amt and Booked Qty with different types of aggregation like Sum, First on Time , Last on Time and Count Distinct. 
All the metrics in this table are physically mapped to columns in the Revenue fact table.

logicalColumns.name: 1 ==== Revenue Base Metrics ========
logicalColumns.description:
Help :
Header object, dummy not to be used in any queries

logicalColumns.name: 1- Revenue
logicalColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Dollars physical column in FactsRev table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:02 - Sample App Exa Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE_EXA.F10 Billed Rev\..Revenue
physicalColumn:02 - Sample App Exa Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE_AGGS.FACT_AGG_OR_03.Revenue00004032

logicalColumns.name: 30 ==== Counts ============
logicalColumns.description:
Help :
Header object, dummy not to be used in any queries

logicalColumns.name: 31  # of Orders (Bn limit)
logicalColumns.description:
Help :
# of Orders is calculated by counting the distinct occurences of an order in the fact table

logicalColumns.name: 31  # of Orders  (Cnt Distinct)
logicalColumns.description:
Help :
# of Orders is calculated by counting the distinct occurences of an order in the fact table

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F0 Sales Base Measures.31  # of Orders (Bn limit)

logicalColumns.name: 32  # of Cust with Orders  (Cnt Distinct)
logicalColumns.description:
Help :
# of Customers is calculated by counting the distinct occurences of a customer in the fact table
